Class UserServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.daw.pms.Service.PMS.impl.UserServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserService, Serializable

public class UserServiceImpl
extends Object
implements UserService, Serializable

      • getUserInfo

        public Result getUserInfo(Long id,
                          Integer platform)
        Return user information for specific platform.

        Return user information for specific platform.

        Specified by:
        getUserInfo in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        id - Your user id in pms.
        platform - Which platform the user belongs to. 0 represents pms, 1 represents qq music, 2 represents netease cloud music, 3 represents bilibili.
        Returns:
        User information for specific platform.
